name: Dan Heng
descHash: A cold and reserved young man who is reticent about his past. To avoid his kin, he decided to travel with the Astral Express.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

267805.name: Storm Eye
267805.desc: Arrows belonged to a Stormbringer. Can be used for the Ascension of Wind characters.
267805.lore:
Used to belong to a certain Fragmentum monster modeled after a certain kind of Voidrangers. An arrowhead can be barely seen buried in the center of the vortex.

"Those who perish in the Fragmentum shall rise again where they met their demise."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549438.name: Extinguished Core
549438.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
549438.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster.

"Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: one half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Flamespawns or other enemies
Rivet Town: Flamespawns or other enemies

633379.name: Glimmering Core
633379.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Normal material used for enhancement.
633379.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is glimmering and the veins on it indicate it's still alive.

"What kind of monster is this? Did you see it... Its face! It has the face of our previous leader!"
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Equilibrium Level 2+ Flamespawns or other enemies
Rivet Town: Equilibrium Level 2+ Flamespawns or other enemies

635674.name: Arrow of the Beast Hunter
635674.desc: An arrowhead forged with Frost Steel by the craftsmen of Xianzhou. Used to level up Traces slightly for Hunt characters.
635674.lore:
A gift that parents give to their children who've successfully hunted their first prey at their coming of age ceremony. It is a blessing that their life would be as successful and true as an arrow heading towards its mark.

"May the arrow on your waist and the sword in your sheath stay true and always find its target."

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Equilibrium Level 4+ Flamespawns or other enemies
Rivet Town: Equilibrium Level 4+ Flamespawns or other enemies

836260.name: Arrow of the Starchaser
836260.desc: A shard of the Sky-Shattering Lux Arrow shot by the Reignbow Arbiter. Used to level up Traces significantly for Hunt characters.
836260.lore:
The remains of a divine construct that ordinary humans can rarely behold. What kind of force can shatter stars that are light-years away? Humanity can only imagine the power of the Lux Arrow from the ashes it left behind.
Only the Furnace Master, chief of the Xianzhou artisans, has the rights to reforge the shards for those who are worthy.

"The death of a star shall shine bright for ages to come."

920201.name: Arrow of the Demon Slayer
920201.desc: An arrowhead forged with Stellaris Essence by the craftsmen of Xianzhou. Used to level up Traces moderately for Hunt characters.
920201.lore:
An arrow narrower than a finger's width. It can be loaded into an electromagnetic crossbow or a thermal seeking bow as ammunition. Its power is enough to penetrate the tough shells of abominations with just one strike.

"The celestial banished arrives from afar, great distances journeyed 'twixt oceans of stars. Like rain falls a cloudburst of arrows below, in a helmet reflected the bright lunar glow."

985668.name: Destroyer's Final Road
985668.lore:
The Leviathan's heart has stopped beating, but its mind lives on despite being trapped in a case. As long as the lid is closed, its mind is simultaneously both alive and dead, driving the engine of destruction.

"Doomsday Beast, a blight made in the Warforge using what's left of a Leviathan and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead. It longs for the destruction of the universe and itself."

ranks.name: The Higher You Fly, the Harder You Fall
ranks.descHash: When the target enemy's current HP percentage is greater than or equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, CRIT Rate increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Quell the Venom Octet, Quench the Vice O'Flame
Seen and Unseen
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Roaring Dragon and Soaring Sun
ranks.descHash: When Dan Heng uses his Ultimate to defeat an enemy, his next action is Advanced Forward by <nobr>100%</nobr>.

ranks.name: A Drop of Rain Feeds a Torrent
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: The Troubled Soul Lies in Wait
ranks.descHash: The Slow state triggered by Skill reduces the enemy's SPD by an extra <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
skills.descHash: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
skills.descHash:
Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.
On a CRIT Hit, there is a #4[i]% base chance to reduce the target's SPD by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

skills.name: Ethereal Dream
skills.descHash: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, the Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by #2[i]%.

skills.name: Superiority of Reach
skills.descHash: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by #1[i]%. This effect can be triggered again after #2[i] turn(s).

skills.name: Attack
skills.descHash: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Splitting Spearhead
skills.descHash: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> at the start of the next battle for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

embedBonusSkill.name: Hidden Dragon
embedBonusSkill.descHash: When current HP percentage is <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

embedBonusSkill.name: High Gale
embedBonusSkill.descHash: Basic ATK deals <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> more DMG to Slowed enemies.

embedBonusSkill.name: Faster Than Light
embedBonusSkill.descHash: After launching an attack, there is a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> fixed chance to increase own SPD by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> turn(s).

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: I should reintroduce myself. My name is Dan Heng — I'm the guard on the Express. I also administer the train's data bank.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: I updated the data bank entries today if you wanted to look anything up.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Time to turn in already...? Thanks for the reminder. It's easy to lose track of time in the archives — before you know it, a whole day's gone by... See you tomorrow.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Past
voiceItems.text: I come from an alliance, and was born on a grand and beautiful ship that I barely had the chance to see... I can never return.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Reason for Boarding the Express
voiceItems.text: At that time, I had nowhere to go but the Express.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Cloud-Piercer
voiceItems.text: Cloud-Piercer is always with me. For my safety, and the safety of everyone else.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: It's not really a hobby, but I used to read a lot...

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: If you're not there to look something up, then please don't enter the archives. It's not a place for chitchat.

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: As vast as the universe is, it cannot change its past.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: Once there are sufficient records in the data bank, the flow of individuals will link together seemingly independent events.

voiceItems.title: About March 7th
voiceItems.text: March's weakness is that she likes to get involved in other people's business. ...Perhaps that's also her strength.

voiceItems.title: About Himeko
voiceItems.text: If you have questions about the Express, Himeko can give you the best answer.

voiceItems.title: About Welt
voiceItems.text: Mr. Yang is a very compassionate person, but thankfully he doesn't pry.

voiceItems.title: About Pom-Pom
voiceItems.text: My intuition tells me that it would be unwise to provoke the conductor.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A cold and reserved young man who wields a spear known as Cloud-Piercer. He acts as the Express' guard on its long trailblazing expedition.
Dan Heng never talks much about his past. In fact, he joined the Express Crew to escape from a past of his own making.
But can the Express really help him outrun his past?
